column5: Just drove thru a large area of dark sky and torrential rain south of Lindsay Official radio warning of rotating clouds and tornado risk.
All is good in the Snug Harbour area, radar looks like the worst is passed us now but it looks like about 4500 people without power in the Fenelon Falls/Bobcaygon areas. Hope everyone is ok!
Heard the warning on the radio, we're getting hammered on and off with heavy rain in Hamilton, I'm happy to see it, my backyard grass is like hay haha
Seems all clear here now, and what came down, seems to be sucked up already, Wouldnt know we had a 2 hour down pour.
What rain? We had five minutes if that! In Woody! Just came back from a walk with the little ones and it was dry!!!  keep well where it's happening.
we got an inch and a half of  rain there
not much here in Wasaga---some distant thunder.
only reports I've seen show God try'd to cleanse south Oshawa.

May have been a tornado down the road from us in omemee ? ..... It came through sturgeon lake big time lots of torrential rain thunder and lightning yes we were under tornado warning for a while and it got nasty but made it through pretty good some branches down and a dock or 2 got flipped ...... Oshawa & omemee and now seems like Brampton as well as port bolster had tornadoes lots of damage appearing on Facebook I see as well as news reports
Heavy winds must have went just South of us then. Lots of rain on the East side of Pigeon, but no wind damage around my area.
only reports I've seen show God try'd to cleanse south Oshawa. Now that's funny...
Lots and lots on rain on Buckhorn, but I could still bowl 10 pin on my lawn!

We finally got a few hours of steady rain for the first time this year. The strangest thing this AM. So we get a few hours of rain last night and at 10 this morning we have 60% green lawn. Next door too. That is strange. It was golden brown yesterday with green patches. We have cut the lawn a grand total of 3 times this year. Because I broke down and bought my wife a new  lawnmower that will start on 1 pull.
Because I broke down and bought my wife a new  lawnmower that will start on 1 pull.   You're a real gentleman!!!

Because I broke down and bought my wife a new  lawnmower that will start on 1 pull.  I got Debbe a lawn mower years ago for mothers day. Don't know how many pulls it takes to start it. I'll have to ask her the next time she's cutting the grass
Came in to work today and the engineering office drop ceiling was on the floor, in a puddle...  Not been a productive day to say the least!
?????  Whats a lawn mower?  My 11 and 13 year old sons

Yep she really is good at it. Now the truth, I don't cut it right. No pattern. That's just fine with me, I quit a few years ago. But seriously the lawns and ditches are green today, not Masters green but not yellow like all year.
my ridem' isn't working and my push one is messed up too. just don't have the cash for new or to be fixed so...
I had to get over the ocd of a perfect lawn when are kids took over.  I dont know what goes through their heads but the way they cut are lawn is borderline crazy???

I was out in Calabogie at a Blues Fest with my wife on the weekend.  We decided to duck into the tent for a sleep during the heavy down pour then crawled out after things died down.  The neighbour said the whole area of the camp was evacuated and moved into the hotel during the weather watch.  LOL My wife and I slept right through it and didn't hear anything about an evacuation.
Musta been good whatever you were doing in the tent ?

I got Debbe a lawn mower years ago for mothers day. Don't know how many pulls it takes to start it. I'll have to ask her the next time she's cutting the grass  I got Maribeth a riding mower when we moved up here but she can't stand the smell of gasoline or exhaust...LOL
Musta been good whatever you were doing in the tent LOL, that would be snoring at our age.
